thread.title_full: Roosevelt - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: O1357GRrichardt
title: Roosevelt -
text: The Roosevelt ,treated us great from the time we arrived until we departed .The Bell staff was extremely helpful especially Sal the Doorman .The Housekeeping Kept our rooms clean .Claudette the operator was great to deal with before our arrival and her information she gave us was great . The front desk was good to deal with .
